alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kimble, southeastern Menard and southwestern Mason Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-83 Near The Kimble- Menard County Line, or 8 miles west of Yates Crossing, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Mountain, Yates Crossing, London, Saline, Streeter, Erna and Us- 377 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
